name: DVD Bouncing Logo (Customizable!)
description:
Here you see bouncing DVD logo, made in scratch. (wow)

Press "Z" to see the menu, you can also change some options, PROTIP: Click to spawn more logos 8)

Thanks to sheeptester for htmlifier for scratch, I used that to export the project to html.

Warning: Could be a bit stuttery, because the speed is based on framerate instead of timer... should probably fix that but whatever

>original project by me
